This issue is caused by third-party antivirus or an enabled kernel isolation (Windows 11). 

Solution:
Remove third-party antiviruses and reboot your PC
Disable kernel isolation
Disable anti-cheat software (Faceit, Vanguard, etc.)

The issue is due to overlays that prevent the menu from showing up.

Solution:

Disable all overlays (NVIDIA, FRAPS, DISCORD, etc. — I can't know what's on your PC)
Reinstall the game from the official source if it's installed via Epic Games (no way to disable the overlay if the game is through this launcher)
